# packages/adapter-rust/vendor/codelldb/win32-x64/lldb/lib/encodings/gb18030.py
@source-hash: 6c10b4dc49bc6372
@generated: 2026-02-09T18:10:46Z

## Purpose
Python Unicode codec implementation for GB18030 Chinese character encoding standard. Provides comprehensive encoding/decoding support through Python's codec framework.

## Key Components

### Core Codec (L10, L12-14)
- `codec` (L10): Native GB18030 codec instance from `_codecs_cn.getcodec('gb18030')`
- `Codec` class (L12-14): Basic encoder/decoder wrapper around native codec implementation

### Incremental Processing (L16-22)
- `IncrementalEncoder` (L16-18): Supports piece-by-piece encoding via multiple inheritance from `mbc.MultibyteIncrementalEncoder` and `codecs.IncrementalEncoder`
- `IncrementalDecoder` (L20-22): Supports piece-by-piece decoding with same inheritance pattern

### Stream Processing (L24-28)
- `StreamReader` (L24-25): File-like object decoder combining `Codec`, `mbc.MultibyteStreamReader`, and `codecs.StreamReader`
- `StreamWriter` (L27-28): File-like object encoder with similar multiple inheritance pattern

### Registration Function (L30-39)
- `getregentry()` (L30-39): Returns `codecs.CodecInfo` object for Python codec registry integration, providing all codec interfaces

## Dependencies
- `_codecs_cn`: Native Chinese codecs module (provides actual GB18030 implementation)
- `codecs`: Python standard codec framework
- `_multibytecodec` (mbc): Multibyte codec support utilities

## Architecture Pattern
Uses delegation pattern where all classes delegate actual encoding/decoding work to the native `codec` instance while providing Python codec framework compliance through multiple inheritance.
